articles.name: What is DropIn?
articles.title: What is DropIn?
articles.body: DropIn is a new video streaming service that allows you to request an on-demand live stream of any location in the world, anytime. When a Viewer requests a stream, they are instantly connected with a Droperator, who navigates to the requested location and initiates a live video feed.

articles.name: What is a Droperator?
articles.title: What is a Droperator?
articles.body: Droperators are individuals who earn money creating live stream content for Viewers. Anybody with a video-enabled smartphone can become a Droperator by completing a simple application.

articles.name: What is a Viewer?
articles.title: What is a Viewer?
articles.body: Anyone who creates a DropIn account is a Viewer by default. Viewers request live streams by entering the address of a location they’d like to see, or simply by dropping a pin on the map.

articles.name: How do I request a live stream?
articles.title: How do I request a live stream?
articles.body:
When you are logged in to the app in Viewer mode, go to the map view and enter the address of a location you’d like to see. If you do not have an exact address, you can also drop a pin on the map in the vicinity of your desired live stream location.

Tap the “Find Droperator” button at the bottom of your screen to submit your request. Once the nearest Droperator has accepted your request, you’ll see them on the map enroute to the Drop location.

articles.name: How much does a live stream cost?
articles.title: How much does a live stream cost?
articles.body: There is a $10 base fee per live stream.The current live stream rate is $1-per-minute, which begins when a Droperator accepts your request and ends when the stream is disconnected.

articles.name: How do I apply to become a Droperator?
articles.title: How do I apply to become a Droperator?
articles.body:
First, you’ll need to complete your profile and request an application. Select “Become a Droperator” from the main menu, or toggle from Viewer mode to Droperator mode in the top right corner of your map screen. This will take you to your Droperator profile page.

Fill out your profile information, then tap the “Register” button. After registering, you will receive an email with step-by-step instructions on how to complete your electronic application. You will be notified within 24 hours if your application has been approved.

articles.name: How can I make money as a Droperator?
articles.title: How can I make money as a Droperator?
articles.body: Droperators set their own schedules and earn money whenever they choose. In your spare time, just switch the app to Droperator mode and accept incoming Viewer requests near your current location. After you’ve successfully fulfilled a request, the funds you earned will be deposited directly into your account on a monthly basis.

articles.name: Can Viewers watch a live stream again, after it’s ended?
articles.title: Can Viewers watch a live stream again, after it’s ended?
articles.body: Yes, once a live stream is complete, a Viewer receives an email with instructions on how to download the recording.

articles.name: Can Droperators download the live streams they create?
articles.title: Can Droperators download the live streams they create?
articles.body: No, Droperators do not have access to the videos they create. Only Viewers can download recordings.

articles.name: What iOS devices support DropIn?
articles.title: What iOS devices support DropIn?
articles.body: The following iPhone models are compatible with DropIn – 5, 5s, 6, 6 plus, 6s, 6s plus

articles.name: Mayday! I’m having technical difficulties with the app and can’t find answers in the Help Center.
articles.title: Mayday! I’m having technical difficulties with the app and can’t find answers in the Help Center.
articles.body: Not to worry, our support team is here to help. You can submit your question directly through the Help Center, or email us support@dropininc.com. Please include details about the issue you’re experiencing and screenshots, if possible. A member of our team will get back to you shortly to resolve the issue.

articles.name: I want to request a live stream of the Eiffel Tower, but there aren’t any Droperators available in Paris. What’s up with that?
articles.title: I want to request a live stream of the Eiffel Tower, but there aren’t any Droperators available in Paris. What’s up with that?
articles.body: DropIn is actively expanding coverage to new cities and locations every day. We currently have Droperators in Los Angeles. If there is a location you want to see that’s not yet available, register for updates at DropIninc.com to be notified when we launch in your desired area.

articles.name: How do I create a corporate partnership with DropIn?
articles.title: How do I create a corporate partnership with DropIn?
articles.body: If you’d like to collaborate we would love to hear from you! Please contact our partnerships team at support@dropininc.com.
